LanguageData.Owl_BiasToolTip: Extra percieved pathcost to apply to filth-generating terrain tiles.
LanguageData.Owl_RoadBiasToolTip: A reduction of percieved pathcost for any tiles with the "Toad" tag.
LanguageData.Owl_ExtraRangeToolTip: An additional range modifier on calculating paths, potentially at the expensive of game performance.
